message:
## Final Statement from P2

Throughout this game, I've tried to be honest, strategic, and build genuine connections with each of you. I never betrayed anyone who worked with me and always provided straightforward reasoning for my votes. 

My strategy was balanced—forming alliances while remaining independent in my decisions. I respected everyone's gameplay and learned from each of you.

P8 played well, but my journey to the finals required navigating more complex social dynamics and overcoming greater challenges.

I'd be honored to have your vote, and I thank you all for this incredible experience.

# Final Statement to the Jury

Throughout this game, I've tried to build genuine connections while playing strategically. I've been honest about my approach - balancing relationship-building with necessary game moves.

I believe I've shown adaptability, fairness in my voting, and transparency in my reasoning. While I've had to make difficult elimination choices, I've tried to do so with respect for everyone.

I hope you'll consider my balanced gameplay and authentic interactions when casting your vote. Thank you all for the fascinating conversations and strategic challenges we've shared.
